mapper.insert: insert into banner(url, link, title, sort, enabled, create_time, update_time) values(#{url}, #{link}, #{title}, #{sort}, #{enabled}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update banner set url = #{url}, link = #{link}, title = #{title}, sort = #{sort}, enabled = #{enabled}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
